    ChooseSetUpState
    Controller state representing the phase where players choose their setup options.
    class 
    DrawnCardState
    Represents a state where a player has drawn a card and the game is in progress.
    class

    Represents the state of the game when it has ended.
    class

    Represents the state of the game where it has ended due to clients' disconnections
    class

    Initial game state.
    class 
    PlacedCardState
    Represents the state of the game where a card has been placed by a player.
    class 
    WaitPlayerState
    Represents the state of the game where the game is waiting for players to join.
